input.sentences: the even was very exciting for those involved .
the people were having a good time
output.sentences: There is no picture in this or any frame so I guess I am called upon to use my imagination.
The second frame like the first is bare but I am reminded of what could be there, perhaps a child with a ball.
I imagine the child with the ball bouncing it toward a group of friends who smile when they see her approaching.
Then I imagine the three of them laughing and tossing the ball among them.
Then they jump up and down with glee and a helpful adult returns the ball to the children.
